title: [娱乐][其他]TrainCarts——火车插件[1.8-1.15.2]
author: 红茶123
txt_content:
本帖最后由 红茶123 于 2020-3-7 13:15 编辑 


授权转载证明

插件作者：TeamBergerhealer
当前最新版本: 1.15.2v1
TrainCarts




9464ff204d9d04cf28b805ecab762137600ad4b4.png (8.35 KB, 下载次数: 4)

下载附件

2018-4-22 22:55 上传





前言我是第一次发帖，如果哪里有错误，可以指出一下，谢谢！我知道论坛里已经有人搬运过，但原搬运帖太久没更新了，而且插件作者已更到1.13.2的版本，所以我接下坑。（用过一段时间，觉得插件很好，没人接坑就觉得有些可惜）因为我外语能力不是很好，一些内容基本是靠自己的意思写的，可能有错误的地方，欢迎指出！




TrainCarts 介绍 TrainCart是一个铁路插件，2辆矿车就可以连成一辆列车。可以通过牌子/指令控制矿车速度、牌子控制方向等。(新版本(1.12.2v2以上版本)可以改矿车模型，支持自定义矿车模型）


TrainCarts 特性· 以碰撞链接矿车：不需要指令制作火车
· 如同移动单个矿车一样简单的移动火车
· 使用告示牌电路制作地铁系统，复杂的铁路以及更多
  · 车站，优雅地停止和启动火车
  · 启动器
  · 生成器
  · 传送
  · 玩家进入/弹出
  · 属性设置
  · 标签系统，根据火车的标签选择不同的轨道
  · 目的地系统是你的火车自动前往很远的目的地
  · 在火车和存贮方块见传输物品
· 支持矿车的一些疯狂的特性
· 使无限的矿车速度成为可能，比原版更快！
· 改变矿车的样子
· 可以调整碰撞模式以取消和玩家，怪物，别的火车的碰撞
· 大量的修复原版矿车的物理系统，修复网络同步的bug（脱轨时）
· 检测区域，检测一段铁轨上的矿车
· 用梯子做的垂直铁轨
· 压力板做的十字交叉
· 可以自定义铁轨和告示牌行为的API
· 将玩家和火车一起传送（需要MyWorlds）

· 在告示牌上显示到达时间（需要SignLink）
· 推开：将生物，玩家，物品推离火车以确保正常运行
· 所有东西都是可配置的
· 非常有趣！ 



TrainCarts 配置文件Config.yml#> This is the configuration file of TrainCarts#> In here you can tweak TrainCarts to what you want#> For more information, you can visit the following websites:#> http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/Bukkit/TrainCarts#> http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/traincarts.29491/
# Settings for normally-aligned (straight) cartsnormal:  # The distance between two carts in a train  cartDistanceGap: 0.5  # The factor at which this distance is kept  cartDistanceForcer: 0.1  cartDistanceForcerConstant: 0.0
# The maximum allowed cart distance, after this distance the carts break apartmaxCartDistance: 4.0
# Whether or not the combined carts (powered/storage minecarts) break up into two itemsbreakCombinedCarts: false
# A performance boost to give to powered minecarts (0 = normal speed)poweredCartBoost: 0.1
# The boosting factor of powered rails (default = 0.06)poweredRailBoost: 0.06
# The maximum velocity (blocks/tick) a minecart can possibly have setmaxVelocity: 5.0
# The multiplier used to slow down minecarts# Normal is the default, slow is when the minecart is meant to slow down.slowDownMultiplier:  normal: 0.997  slow: 0.96
# The maximum allowed ejection distance for eject signsmaxEjectDistance: 10.0
# The amount of velocity stations give when launching trainslaunchForce: 10.0
# Settings used when carts collide with entitiescollision:  # If train owners are ignored  ignoreOwners: false  # If global train owners are ignored  ignoreGlobalOwners: false  # The amount of force at which minecarts push away others  pushAwayForce: 0.2
# Whether or not all minecarts spawned on the server turn into TrainCarts' Minecarts# Note that the TrainCart placement permission is then no longer activeallMinecartsAreTrainCarts: false
# Whether or not powered minecarts obtain their coal from attached storage minecartsuseCoalFromStorageCart: false
# Whether or not the player that places a minecart is set ownersetOwnerOnPlacement: true
# Whether or not a hissing sound is made when trains stop at a stationplaySoundAtStation: true
# What style of launching to use in stations and launcher sign systems by default. Possible values:# - 'linear': gradually switches from one motion speed to another at a linear rate# - 'bezier': uses a bezier curve (ease in-out), resulting in slower changes in motion at start/end of launchlaunchFunction: bezier
# Whether or not chunks are only kept loaded when the train is movingkeepChunksLoadedOnlyWhenMoving: false
# Whether to enable or cancel collisions with blocks above minecarts# Some constructions depend on these block collisions to block minecarts# If these collisions are unwanted, they can be turned off hereenableCeilingBlockCollision: true
# Advanced: Whether trains use a different way of server->client synchronization# With this enabled, trains are expected to move smoother with less bumping# With this disabled, no smoothing is applied. Only disable it if it causes problems/incompatibilityuseNetworkSynchronizer: true
# Enable or disable seeing yourself in third-person on vertical rails# Turning this off only causes this mode to activate when going upside-downenableSeatThirdPersonView: true
# The maximum length a detector region (between two detectors) can bemaxDetectorLength: 2000
# The maximum amount of minecart items that can be stacked in one itemmaxMinecartStackSize: 64
# The maximum radius chest/furnace sign systems look for the needed blocksmaxTransferRadius: 5
# The default radius chest/furnace sign systems look for the needed blocksdefaultTransferRadius: 2
# Whether or not empty minecarts slow down faster than occupied minecartsslowDownEmptyCarts: false
# Whether storage minecarts get fuel when launching from stationsrefillAtStations: true
# When set to true, players will be able to break minecarts with a single slap
# No item drops are spawned for minecarts destroyed this way. Minecart contents ARE dropped.# They can still select minecarts by crouching and then slapping the minecart
# When set to false, players will never instantly destroy minecarts and they will have to break it as if in survival.instantCreativeDestroy: true
# Whether minecarts are allowed to have a 90-degree pitch angle when going up vertical rails# When disabled, minecarts will keep a 0-degree pitch angle insteadallowVerticalPitch: true
# Whether upside-down rail functionality is enabled on the server# When disabled, minecarts can not be rotated upside-downallowUpsideDownRails: true
# Before TrainCarts v1.12.1-v2 vertical rail gravity was kind of awful# It took a lot more speed to get up a vertical rail compared to sloped rails# This was fixed. If you depend on this legacy behavior, change this option to TruelegacyVerticalGravity: false
# Before TrainCarts v1.12.2-v1 speed limiting was done on each individual axis# This had a big impact on air physics, because it never made a good ellipse fall# This was changed to preserving the motion vector direction when doing speed limiting# Slight changes may have occurred in curves, slopes and through-air physics# To restore the old limiting system, set this option to TruelegacySpeedLimiting: false
# Whether players (with build permissions) can edit existing rails by right-clicking on themallowRailEditing: true
# What velocity to set when a player tries to manually move a train (by damaging it)manualMovementSpeed: 12.0
# The currency Ticket signs will display in messages, %value% represents the displayed valuecurrencyFormat: '%value% Dollars'
# Whether trains can be teleported to the nether (or back) when rails are laid close to the portalsallowNetherTeleport: true
# The delay (in ticks) between ejecting and re-entering by collision (e.g. mobs auto-entering carts)collisionReEnterDelay: 100# Whether powered activator rails eject players inside Minecarts (Vanilla)# If activator rails are used for decoration purposes, this should be disabledactivatorEjectEnabled: true
# A list of world names where TrainCarts should be disabled# World names are not case-sensitivedisabledWorlds:- DefaultWorld1- DefaultWorld2
# The block materials that can be broken using minecarts# Players with the admin block break permission can use any type# Others have to use one from this listallowedBlockBreakTypes:- LOG- CROPS
# Whether or not to show item animations when transferring itemsshowTransferAnimations: true
# Whether a crafting table must exist when crafting items inside a storage minecart# When this is set to false and no crafting table is nearby, no item transfer animations are showncraftingRequireWorkbench: true
# Several shortcuts you can use on announce signs (text is replaced)messageShortcuts:  welcome: '&eWelcome to &f'
# Several shortcuts you can use on switcher and detector signs (text is replaced)statementShortcuts:  diamond: i@diamond
# Several shortcuts you can use on signs to set the itemsitemShortcuts:  fuel: ''  heatable: ''  armor: diamond_chestplate;chainmail_leggings;diamond_boots;diamond_leggings;leather_boots;leather_helmet;iron_helmet;gold_helmet;diamond_helmet;chainmail_helmet;leather_chestplate;chainmail_boots;iron_boots;gold_boots;iron_leggings;gold_leggings;iron_chestplate;leather_leggings;gold_chestplate;chainmail_chestplate  sword: wood_sword;stone_sword;iron_sword;gold_sword;iron_sword;diamond_sword  boots: leather_boots;iron_boots;gold_boots;diamond_boots;chainmail_boots  leggins: leather_leggings;iron_leggings;gold_leggings;diamond_leggings;chainmail_leggings  chestplate: leather_chestplate;iron_chestplate;gold_chestplate;diamond_chestplate;chainmail_chestplate  helmet: leather_helmet;iron_helmet;gold_helmet;diamond_helmet;chainmail_helmet
# Enables parsing signs with (train), as well as [train]# This makes it easier to write signs with a Mac keyboard layoutparseParentheses: trueDefaultTrainProperties.ymldefault:  soundEnabled: true  displayName: ''  allowPlayerTake: false  requirePoweredMinecart: false  trainCollision: true  collisionDamage: 1.0  keepChunksLoaded: false  speedLimit: 0.4  waitDistance: 0.0  banking:    strength: 0.0    smoothness: 10.0  slowDown: true  allowManualMovement: false  tickets: []  collision:    players: DEFAULT    misc: PUSH    train: LINK  blockTypes: ''  blockOffset: unset  owners: 0.0  exitPitch: 0.0  blockBreakTypes: []  destination: ''  enterMessage: ''  spawnItemDrops: trueadmin:  soundEnabled: true  displayName: ''  allowPlayerTake: false  requirePoweredMinecart: false  trainCollision: true  collisionDamage: 1.0  keepChunksLoaded: false  speedLimit: 0.4  waitDistance: 0.0  banking:    strength: 0.0    smoothness: 10.0  slowDown: true  allowManualMovement: false  tickets: []  collision:    players: DEFAULT    misc: PUSH    train: LINK  blockTypes: ''  blockOffset: unset  owners: []  ownerPermissions: []  tags: []  allowPlayerEnter: 1.0  keepChunksLoaded: false  speedLimit: 0.4  waitDistance: 0.0  banking:    strength: 0.0    smoothness: 10.0  slowDown: true  allowManualMovement: false  tickets: []  collision:    players: DEFAULT    misc: PUSH    train: LINK  blockTypes: ''  blockOffset: unset  owners: []  ownerPermissions: []  tags: []  allowPlayerEnter: true  allowPlayerExit: true  invincible: false  isPublic: true  pickUp: false  exitOffset:     ==: Vector    x: 0.0    y: 0.0    z: 0.0  exitYaw: 0.0  exitPitch: 0.0  blockBreakTypes: []  destination: ''  enterMessage: ''  spawnItemDrops: true
Localization.yml
#> Below are the localization nodes set for plugin 'Train_Carts'.#> For colors, use the & character followed up by 0 - F#> Need help with this file? Please visit:#> http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mod ... neral/localization/commands:  cart:    description: Perform TrainCarts commands for single minecarts    usage: See development or WIKI page of TrainCarts  train:    description: Perform TrainCarts commands for complete trains    usage: See development or WIKI page of TrainCartscommand:  about: TrainCarts %0% - See WIKI page for more information  noperm: &cYou do not have permission, ask an admin to do this for you.edit:  noselect: &eYou haven't selected a train to edit yet!  notallowed: &cYou are not allowed to own trains!  nonefound: &cYou do not own any trains you can edit.  notowned: &cYou do not own this train!select:  destination: &eYou have selected &f%0%&e as your destination!ticket:  expired: &cYour ticket for %0% is expired  required: &cYou do not own a ticket for this train!  used: &aYou have used your &e%0%&a ticket!  conflict: &cYou own multiple tickets that can be used for this train. Please holdthe right ticket in your hand!  ownerconflict: &cThe train ticket %0% is not yours, it belongs to %1%!  typeconflict: &cThe train ticket %0% can not be used for this train!  add: &f[Ticket System]&e You received %0% in your bank account!  check: &f[Ticket System]&e You currently have %0% in your bank account!  buyfail: &f[Ticket System]&c You can't afford a Ticket for %0%, sorry.  buy: &f[Ticket System]&e You bought a Ticket for %0%.

trains keep nearby chunks loaded    invincible:      default: op      description: The player can set if his owned trains are invincible    pushing:      default: true      description: The player can set if his owned trains push away certain entities    slowdown:      default: true      description: The player can set if his owned trains slow down over time    setcollide:      default: true to        file    message:      default: op      description: Whether the player can add message shortcuts    pathinfo:      default: op      description: Whether the player can view the route the train is following to        reach the destination    playertake:      default: op      description: Whether the player can change if players take Minecarts with them        when they leave    soundenabled:      default: op      description: Whether the player can turn Minecart sound on or off    teleport:      default: op      description: Whether the player can teleport to where trains are    changeblock:      default: op      description: Whether the player can alter the type of block displayed in a minecart    changetick:      default: op      description: Whether the player can alter the global update tick rate of TrainCarts(debug!)    issue:      default: true      description: Whether the player can report problems with TrainCarts    editor:      default: op      description: Whether the player can use commands to give himself editors for trains (models) and signs  build:    station:      default: op      description: The player can build train stations    spawner:      default: op      description: The player can build train spawners    trigger:      default: op      description: The player can build train triggers    destination:      default: op build train destructors    detector:      default: op      description: The player can build train detectors    ejector:      default: op      description: The player can build train ejectors    property:      default: op      description: The player can build train property setters    collector:      default: op      description: The player can build systems to let trains collect from storage        blocks    depositor:      default: op      description: The player can build systems to fill storage blocks with items from trains    elevator:      default: op      description: The player can build systems to teleport trains vertically    teleporter:      default: op      description: The player can build train teleporters (portals)    blocker:      default: op      description: The player can build train blockers    wait:      default: op      description: The player can build train wait signs    crafter:      default: op      description: The player can build item crafter signs    ticket:      default: op      description: The player can build a sign that will charge money or ejects a player if he can't pay    announcer:      default: op      description: The player can build a sign that sends a message to all the players        in a train    effect:      default: op      description: The player can build a sign that can play an effect    blockchanger:      default: op      description: The player can build a sign that alters the block displayed in        minecarts    jumper:      default: op      description: The player can build a sign that can cause a train to jump in a        certain direction    launcher:      default: op      description: The player can build a sign that can launch trains    enter:      default: op      description: The player can build a sign that can make nearby players/mobs enter        a train    skipper:      default: op      description: The player can build a sign that can tell a train or minecart to        skip upcoming signs    mutex:      default: op      description: The player can build a sign that defines a mutual exclusion zone,        where only one train can be at    flip:      default: op      description: The player can build a sign that flips the orientation of a Minecart        180 degrees  spawner:    automatic:      default: true      description: The player can build spawners which automatically create carts    regular:      default: true      description: The player can build spawners which create regular minecarts    powered:      default: true      description: The player can build spawners which create powered minecarts    storage:      default: true      description: The player can build spawners which create minecarts with chests    tnt:      default: true      description: The player can build spawners which create minecarts with TNT    hopper:      default: true      description: The player can build spawners which create minecarts with hoppers    command:      default: false      description: The player can build spawners which create minecarts with command        blocks    spawner:      default: true      description: The player can build spawners which create minecarts with spawners  place:    minecart:      default: true      description: The player can place minecarts    traincart:      default: true      description: The player can place TrainCarts minecarts  break:    self:      default: true      description: The player can break their own minecarts    other:      default: true      description: The player can break any cart except for invincible ones    any:      default: op      description: The player can break all carts in the game  properties:    admin:      default: op      description: Carts placed by this player get the admin properties  ticket:    manage:      default: op      description: The player can edit the details of existing tickets or create new tickets  debug:    default: op    description: The player can use special commands useful for debugging the plugintran:  command:    save:      default: op      description: Whether the player can use a command to save a train under a name
TrainCarts 指令/train speedlimit 0-5指令说明：这个是调节矿车速度的指令，速度最高是5（最好在直路用3-5的速度，转弯太多的铁路建议0.4-2的速度）示例:/train speedlimit 1/train list指令说明：查看全世界的矿车。/train removeall指令说明：这个指令会删掉全世界的矿车，谨慎使用！/train remove指令说明：这个指令会删掉刚才坐的矿车。/train setname指令说明：这是给矿车设置名字的。示例：/train setname 一辆列车/train settag指令说明：这是给矿车设置tag的。/train addtag指令说明：这是给矿车加tag的。 /train keepchunksloaded true/false指令说明：这是设置当前矿车会不会加载区块，true会加载，false不会加载。/train info指令说明：查看当前矿车信息。/train linking true/false指令说明：设置自己矿车能不能连接起来，ture是能，false是不能/train setcollide true/false指令说明：设置矿车能不能碰撞。true能，false不能（false是直接穿过实体）。/train monstercollision push/kill/true/false指令说明：设置矿车的怪物碰撞。push推开，kill杀死，ture开启碰撞，false关闭碰撞示例: /train monstercollisionpush/train npccollision push/kill/ture/false指令说明：设置矿车的npc(村民)碰撞。push推开，kill杀死，ture开启碰撞，false关闭碰撞示例: /train npccollision push推开npc(村民)/train playercollision push/kill/ture/false指令说明：设置矿车的玩家碰撞。push推开，kill杀死，ture开启碰撞，false关闭碰撞示例: /train playercollision push推开玩家/train playerexit true/false指令说明：这个指令是设置玩家能不能下车的，能是true，不能是false/train playerenter true/false指令说明：这个指令是设置玩家能不能进矿车(设置了flase你自己也不能进)/train setdestination 目的地名字指令说明：这个是给矿车设置终点站（目的地）/train setowners 玩家名字指令说明：这是把矿车所有权给另一个玩家，给了另一个玩家后自己无法破坏/train attachments指令说明：获取一张自定义矿车地图（需要先放矿车）/train sound true/false指令说明：这是开或者关矿车声音的除了/train list和/train removeall不用坐上矿车就能用以外，其他的都要先坐上矿车才能用！

TrainCarts 常用牌子请注意，牌子需要在铁轨下方才能使用！
1.车站牌子第一行:[+train]
第二行:station
第三行:停车秒数
第四行:continue(从哪个方向来就从哪个方向走)/left(向左走)/right(向右走)
2.控制速度牌子第一行：[+train]第二行：property第三行：speedlimit第四行：填速度0-53. 强制让X格内的玩家/生物上车牌子第一行：[+train]第二行：enter Xs第三行：players/mobs第四行：true说明：强制让XX格内玩家/生物上车。X是填数字5.矿车碰撞牌子 第一行：[+train]第二行：property第三行：playercollision/mobcollision/npccollision第四行：kill/push/false说明：将逗留在轨道的玩家/生物/npc杀死/推出去/关闭碰撞6.回收矿车第一行：[+cart]第二行：destroy说明：列车行驶到牌子附近时自动回收矿车。暂时列出这么多，更多牌子请到插件wiki查看。插件wiki网址：https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Custom_servers/Bukkit/TrainCarts

如何弄一辆列车？这非常简单，两辆矿车(或以上)放在一起，就连成了一辆列车。但是，加了TrainCarts之后，像以前那样按w前进是不行的。因此我们需要在矿车前后面加上动力矿车，就像这样↓当然，如果是动力铁轨的话，手动推一下车就可以，但是要快点上车(不然溜车了2333)中间的矿车可以弄很长很长很长（可以加其他矿车）

1.12.2v2以上版本自定义矿车模型食用方法此功能只适合1.12.2以上!如果你想做材质，你可以按照以下教程写https://www.spigotmc.org/wiki/custom-item-models-in-1-9-and-up/（1.9以上）虽然1.12.2以下的版本（1.9-1.11.2，目前在1.10.2做了测试）也可以用，但是地图里很多材质都是未知材质！（虽然矿车显示材质的时候是正确材质）造成选的时候很不方便。火车材质虽然能正常显示（选的时候还是未知材质），但是有些火车材质（比如过山车材质），显示出来是未知材质（因为材质是用高版本的方块材质弄的，在这个版本没有这个方块材质，所以才造成显示是未知材质），在这强烈建议1.12.2以上版本使用这功能！！！！！1.12.2v2版本加入了一个比较好的东西，那就是自定义矿车模型啦！不用mod就可以用火车(材质)，是不是很酷？好啦，进入正题。下面教一下大家怎么食用自定义矿车模型。一、导入材质这里放一个原贴里面的一个矿车材质：https://www.dropbox.com/s/hgd90lrqdrm8alr/TrainCarts_Demo_TP.zip注意，由于dropbox被墙了，无法下载材质，因此你需要梯子把材质下载来之后(不方便的我在下面放个材质)，自己开一个http服务器，把材质挂上去就ok了。当然，你也可以在你的客户端里手动丢上材质，这样就能看到火车材质了。（比较麻烦的是有一些玩家可能不会自己手动丢材质，因此还是丢在服务器让玩家进服后下载比较方便）1.打开server.properties，找到resource-pack=，填上材质下载地址。（resource-pack-sha1=里填可不填sha1值）2.重启服务器，再进入游戏，进服提示下载就表示材质导入成功了。(如果有玩家卡住的话，建议让他禁止自动下材质，让他手动加材质包)二、获取自定义矿车地图1.输入/train attachments获取，你会获得一张地图。2.放矿车，拿起地图，会看到这样的界面↓

3.使用W(向上)A(向下)S(向左)D(向右)空格(确认)shift(返回)来控制。三、更换矿车模型1.先选择矿车图标的，空格，进入会看到entity(实体)

要把车子的材质改成实体的话按S，然后按D，寻找到自己喜欢的实体即可。（船、马、潜影贝等实体坐上去不能动，请勿选择。末影龙因为太大，很难坐上去，也不要选择）比如我把车子材质改成熊↓

要把车子改成物品的材质，就按W，再按D，到item那里，然后按S，再按S选择材质。要选择自己刚刚加上去的火车(或者自己做的)材质，就要一直按S，找到金镐（或者自己做时用的物品模型），空格，按D，找到火车材质就能shift返回了。

三、给矿车添加座位与移动座位位置1.返回到菜单，按D，选第四个。




1.png (19.1 KB, 下载次数: 5)

下载附件

2018-4-23 13:22 上传




2.空格，按S，选择Add Attachment，空格确认，就会多了个泥土→




z.png (5.14 KB, 下载次数: 1)

下载附件

2018-4-23 13:25 上传




但是，我们需要调整下第二个位子的位置，不然玩家坐上去就会合♂体,因此我们需要移动下位子。按S选到泥土，空格，然后移动到这个标志→




2.png (623 Bytes, 下载次数: 3)

下载附件

2018-4-23 13:29 上传




(移动矿车位置同样可用)3.进去是这个界面↓




a.png (3.36 KB, 下载次数: 5)

下载附件

2018-4-23 13:36 上传




X是左右，Y是上下，Z是前后调到合适就可以了。然后我们shift返回，选择回泥土，空格。然后按W，再按D，一直选择到SEAT，就可以载人啦！四、火车材质下载



TrainCarts_Demo_TP.zip
(404.46 KB, 下载次数: 178)



2018-4-23 13:42 上传
点击文件名下载附件






如果你想自己做矿车材质，就看一看这个教程吧。(1.9以上)https://www.spigotmc.org/wiki/custom-item-models-in-1-9-and-up/
TrainCarts 倒置轨道、十字交叉轨、垂直轨食用方法一、倒置轨道很简单，只要把铁轨放在方块底下就行了！如图↓（适合做过山车，建议和垂直铁轨、过山车材质食用）请注意上到倒置轨道时要空手，衣服要脱掉。二、十字交叉轨还是很简单，在需要交叉的地方放上压力板（没错，你没看错，就是压力板！任何一个压力板都可以）如图↓当然，你也可以用压力板当做轨道（转弯时要普通铁轨）三、垂直轨依旧很简单，在直的方块上铺上梯子（没看错！是梯子，梯子！）如图↓请注意上到倒置轨道时要空手，衣服要脱掉

最后本插件需要前置插件BKCommonLib，不加进去插件就无法工作！插件下载地址：https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/bkcommonlib.39590/最后推荐TrainCarts的附属插件缆车TC HangRaii：https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/tc-hangrail.39627/浮空轨道TC Floatrail：https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/tc-floatrail.39612/过山车 TC Coasters: https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/tc-coasters.59583/帖子里面有些内容内容会慢慢完善，喜欢的话给点人气吧！
已知问题已知NoCheatPlus会在玩家乘坐矿车的时候会把玩家当做作弊，然后拉回原来的地方，导致车故障。解决办法：修改NoCheatPlus的配置文件checks:
  moving:
    vehicle:
        enforcelocation: false


注意事项1.13+版本的必须把BkcommandLib（前置）升级到BkcommandLib1.13.1-v1(及以上)才能用1.13+的版本！

插件最后更新2020年2月18日

replies.txt_content:
流离人 发表于 2018-5-18 01:17
非常非常有趣的插件，多谢推荐。
不过服务器大多数远距离移动都是用的传送，一时间要改成矿车还不知道该如 ...
远距离移动虽然快，但玩家可能会错过许多风景（没风景除外）。铁路是唯一的好办法，可以让玩家观光。
要是要快的话，你可以用指令给每个车调速度调到5（最高，只适合没那么多弯的地方）或者在某个铁轨的下面贴个速度牌子到哪加速减速

另外，你可以用这个插件造过山车啥的增加乐趣

replies.author: MikTapIO
replies.txt_content:
创世丶丿狼 发表于 2019-5-21 20:56
请问一下  在一天火车线路搭建好之后  火车以设置的速度行驶了3分钟后就停了是什么原因呢？ ...
因为动力矿车有燃料限制 你可以把铁轨换成充能铁轨 这样能一直跑下去
